creator: 0x63f35fc30690ed1111a2bfb75034b1ef41821c66
name: Make a film
description: My friend is a graduate student in film creation at the Communication University of China. He is preparing his graduation film work, but he doesn't have the money to shoot it, and I want to help him finish it by means of DAO. If successful, this will be the first film production on the blockchain to be produced with DAO participation. I am not sure what the film will bring back to its backers, but I guarantee that each participant will receive a beautiful stills of the film.
payDisclosure: Thank you for your contribution to the film
